subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Unicode proposal again.
msgSnippet: ... I agree that A (Shavian-only) is not necessary, but F (one match for sound, one for sight) is critical.  For example, QS F matches Shavian F in sound,
messageBody:
amd64_hacker scripsit:

> I've omitted sections A and F from the XSLT for the moment as they don't
> have a direct impact on the proposal.

I agree that A (Shavian-only) is not necessary, but F (one match for
sound, one for sight) is critical. For example, QS F matches Shavian
F in sound, Shavian TH in shape.

--
MEET US AT POINT ORANGE AT MIDNIGHT BRING YOUR DUCK OR PREPARE TO FACE WUGGUMS
John Cowan cowan@... http://www.ccil.org/~cowan

amd64_hacker scripsit:

> I've omitted sections A and F from the XSLT for the moment as they don't
> have a direct impact on the proposal.

I agree that A (Shavian-only) is not necessary, but F (one match for
sound, one for sight) is critical.  For example, QS F matches Shavian
F in sound, Shavian TH in shape.
